name: Pray Aviation
about: Pray Aviation is an accelerated flight training school based in Augusta, Kansas, and also operating in Singapore. We provide enhanced, accelerated, and affordable flight training to produce world-class pilots. Our Part 61 training syllabus is specialized to trim unnecessary training time while maintaining high quality and safety standards. With a less than 1:3 instructor to student ratio and a large fleet, we offer the fastest training tracks in the industry, flying seven days a week, day and night. We cater to all levels, from complete beginners to military pilots, and offer various courses including Private Pilot, Commercial Pilot, and Flight Instructor certifications. Our in-house facilities, maintenance, and accommodations ensure competitive course prices, and we offer third-party financing options to support our students. Pray Aviation is dedicated to helping you achieve your aviation dreams efficiently and effectively.
